items.title: Regularly $1,600 LG UltraGear 39-inch 240Hz WQHD OLED curved gaming monitor is 56% off at $700 all-time low
items.summary:
While you can still grab LG’s 45-inch UltraGear OLED WQHD gaming monitor at $1,000 with a $700 discount, we just spotted another solid offer at B&H that knocks the brand’s 39-inch UltraGear model in white down to $699.99 shipped. Don’t forget to clip the $200 off coupon to see the discounted price during checkout. Though this carries a $1,300 price tag at B&H, it has fetched as much as $1,600 in recent months at Amazon, so you’re looking at a straight-up 56% markdown on it right now. Today’s deal shaves $900 off its usual going rate, landing it $85 below its previous all-time low. There’s also a 34-inch variant of this model at Amazon if you think that might be a better pick overall for your desk, and it’s fetching $729 at the moment with a relatively lighter deal. Head below for more details.

items.title: Keep fresh herbs growing and within reach in kitchens with this AeroGarden Sprout indoor hydroponic system at $40
items.summary:
AeroGarden Sprout Indoor Hydroponic Garden

Buy for $40 (Reg. $60)

What we love

Bringing home this AeroGarden indoor hydroponic system allows you to grow your favorite herbs, vegetables, or flowers all within the comfort of your home – and within reach when kept in your kitchen. Not needing any messy soil, it instead utilizes a grow deck and water bowl to allow up to three plants to grow as large as 10 inches tall. There’s even a 10W LED grow light for faster germination – plus, it comes with a 3-pod seed kit, plant food, and a starter guide.

items.title: Lectric cuts e-bike accessories as low as $67: Pet trailer, coolers, buddy seat, more
items.summary:
As part of Lectric’s Valentine’s Day e-bike sale, the popular e-mobility brand is also offering up to 15% discounts on select add-on accessories for your ride, like the Pet Trailer for $169 shipped, bringing it down from its full $199 price tag. We’ve previously seen this trailer go as low as $152 back during the brand’s Christmas stocking stuffer sale, with prices otherwise having been seen keeping above $179 when offered discounts, making this the second-best deal you can score it with. This handy little trailer is a great addition if you love taking your furry friends along with you, allowing you to safely shepherd them to parks, appointments, and beyond. It features durable waterproof mesh fabric walls with a zippable opening at the top, as well as an easy-access zipper opening at the front window (plus a plastic cover there). One thing to note if you want to connect it to the Lectric XP Trikes, specifically, is that you’ll also need this hitch and tow bar that is sold separately. Head below to see the full lineup of Valentine’s Day accessory deals, and be sure to also shop the Lectric Valentine’s Day e-bike deals here.

more…

items.title: Save up to 66% on three EcoFlow power station flash offers, like the DELTA 3 Classic at $399 and more
items.summary:
As part of its short-term January Monthly Madness Sale that is closing out the month, EcoFlow has also launched a 48-hour flash sale that is seeing up to 66% discounts on three different units, with things starting lowest on the DELTA 3 Classic Portable Power Station at $399 shipped, matching its current Amazon pricing. While you may spy it carrying a $599 MSRP directly from the brand, and occasionally reaching that high price at Amazon, you’re more likely to find it floating down around $429 on average. While we have seen it go as low as $377 during Black Friday, as well as a one-time $349 low for a single day in early November, you’re still looking at a solid extra $30 cut from its usual going rate ($200 off the MSRP) that lands it at the third-best price we have tracked. Head below to shop the other flash offers before they end tomorrow night, January 30. You can also shop the full EcoFlow January Monthly Madness Sale lineup in our original coverage here.

Persistent bugs, performance issues, intrusive prompts, ads, and bloatware have eroded the core Windows experience. Early system requirement decisions have also damaged […]

Deezer makes its AI music detection tool available for businesses to buy and says daily deliveries of AI tracks averaged 60K in January, ~39% of total uploads  —  The tool, which identifies, tags, and removes AI-generated music from recommendations, has detected over 13.4 million AI tracks in 2025.

items.title: Fall in love with your commute and up to $750 savings during Lectric’s Valentine’s Day e-bike sale – all from $999
items.summary:
With February being a month to celebrate love, along with other things, Lectric has launched its 2026 Valentine’s Day Sale that is seeing up to $753 savings across its long-range e-bike models, as well as some of the standard models. Amongst the many models I’ve been fortunate enough to ride from Lectric, my love is the highest for the XP4 750 Folding Utility e-bike that comes with $409 in FREE gear at $1,299 shipped, while the standard XP4 Folding Utility e-bikes get $79 bundles at $999 shipped. You’d have to shell out $1,708 and $1,078 for these bundle packages without any savings, but as you’re likely aware by now, Lectric regularly offers its discounts on the bundled gear rather than the e-bike’s price tags. The standard models are getting a single LevelUp Rack with their purchase, while the long-range 750 models are also getting an Elite headlight upgrade, a suspension seat post, an accordion-style folding bike lock, a phone mount, and a pair of adjustable mirrors. Head below to see the full lineup of deals while they last.

more…

items.title: EcoFlow January Monthly Madness power station sale takes up to 68% off units + many bonus savings promotions – all from $79
items.summary:
It’s the end of the month, and in usual fashion, EcoFlow has launched its Monthly Madness Sale for January, taking up to 68% off a selection of power stations and accessories, while also offering an array of extra savings alongside up to 3x EcoCredits for purchases (which we go into more detail about below the fold). One notable unit getting increased savings from the previous sale is EcoFlow’s DELTA Pro 3 Portable Power Station at $1,879.06 shipped, after using the code ECOAFF6 at checkout for an additional 6% off, beating out its Amazon pricing by $120. You shouldn’t expect to ever pay its $3,699 MSRP as it often starts lower around $2,299 during sales and at Amazon, with one of the previous sale’s flash offers going the lowest to $1,999. During this sale you’re getting even more savings than before, as $420 is cut from the going rate ($1,820 off the MSRP) to mark a new all-time low price. Head below to shop EcoFlow’s entire Monthly Madness Sale lineup and learn about the many promotions available currently.

items.summary:
Courtesy of Baseus’ official Amazon storefront, Prime members can now score the brand’s 4-port 140W laptop GaN charger for $39.99 shipped. It even comes with a FREE 100W retractable USB-C cable today – simply head to this page right here and add both the 140W charger from the “Qualifying Items” and the 100W cable from the “Benefit Items” tab to your cart and checkout. This particular charger typically goes for $70, which is what folks without a Prime membership will have to pay for it right now. Today’s Prime exclusive discount, however, saves you 42% to mark the return of the lowest price we’ve tracked for it to date. The included FREE cable makes this an even better deal overall, so be sure to snag them after getting more details below.

items.title: Dow plans to cut 4,500 staff to save costs and will rely on AI to boost productivity, resulting in $1.1B to $1.5B in charges; it currently employs ~34,000 staff (Rob Curran/Wall Street Journal)
